prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that embodies calmness and has a shell on its back.
I want a pink creature that evolves from a smaller form and sits lazily by the water.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique blend of blue and pink colors, known for its slow personality.
Make a Pokemon that features a large tail and a relaxed demeanor, perfect for lounging around.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a shell and a round body, often found near coastal areas.
Design a cute, bipedal Pokemon with a pastel palette, often seen daydreaming by the sea.
Show me a Pokemon that possesses a unique ability to use psychic powers while being laid-back.

distinctive_features: Closed eyes with a relaxed expression
